name: Emuallim
tag_list: online-tutor, arab-tutor, english-tutor, math-tutor, private-tutor, tutor-dubai
overview:
Emuallim.com is the world’s First Arab region and Arab student focused online tutoring services company built to serve an estimated 9 million Arab students in the Middle East and North Africa region with access to Broadband Internet. Majority of our teachers are from the Arab countries in addition we also have teachers from Asia, Europe and North America.

Some facts about emuallim.com: • World’s First tutoring website dedicated for Middle East and North Africa to have full audio-video conferencing along with standard tutoring whiteboard functionality. • First website to launch services exclusively for Arab students with Arab teachers. • Offering one-to-one online tutoring to school students for normal academic tutoring. • All tutors are post graduates, engineers and doctorates in relevant subjects and undergo rigorous training in online tutoring processes and emuallim certification.
